Accuracy.description: Correctness of the final answer provided by the agent considering the task requirements.

Completeness.description: The degree to which all required steps to solve the task were successfully completed.

Reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the logical steps taken by the agent to reach the final answer.

Data_contamination.description: Presence of any information that might have been used inappropriately or improperly from external sources.

Resource_utilization.description: The amount of computational and other resources used to arrive at the solution.

Adherence_to_instructions.description: How closely the steps performed match the initial instructions provided for the task.

Answering_time.description: The total time taken from the task initiation to the final answer delivery.

Adaptability.description: Agent's ability to adjust its approach based on new information or changes in the environment.
